report: PIREP: Flap retraction appears slower than normal after takeoff.
action: Ground function test performed, no faults found. SFCC reset. Aircraft released for service.

report: PIREP: Audible 'strange squeaking noise' from right wing during flap extension for landing.
action: Visual inspection of RH flap tracks 4 & 5 revealed no cracks. Tracks lubricated per AMM. Ground function test satisfactory.
